thread.title: Uttar Pradesh will give triple talaq to Samajwadi Party, Congress & BSP: Asaduddin Owaisi
thread.title_full: Uttar Pradesh will give triple talaq to Samajwadi Party, Congress & BSP: Asaduddin Owaisi

author: PTI
title: Uttar Pradesh will give triple talaq to Samajwadi Party, Congress & BSP: Asaduddin Owaisi
text:
Uttar Pradesh will give triple talaq to Samajwadi Party, Congress & BSP: Asaduddin Owaisi Uttar Pradesh will give triple talaq to Samajwadi Party, Congress & BSP: Asaduddin Owaisi Uttar Pradesh will give "triple talaq" to SP, Congress and BSP, AIMIM president Asaduddin Owaisi today said, dubbing Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav "two sides of the same coin". By: PTI | Lucknow | Published: February 4, 2017 3:53 PM 
The AIMIM leader said Muslims accepted Mulayam, Akhilesh and Rajiv Gandhi as their leaders but “they betrayed the community… It is because of their cowardice, injustice and negligence that I had to come in front of you today”. (PTI) 
Uttar Pradesh will give “triple talaq” to SP, Congress and BSP, AIMIM president Asaduddin Owaisi today said, dubbing Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav “two sides of the same coin”. “There is no difference between Modi and Akhilesh… Both make a fool of people in the name of development… Uttar Pradesh will give triple talaq…to SP, Congress and BSP,” he said at an event organised by a news channel here. 
The AIMIM leader said Muslims accepted Mulayam, Akhilesh and Rajiv Gandhi as their leaders but “they betrayed the community… It is because of their cowardice, injustice and negligence that I had to come in front of you today”. 
You May Also Want To Watch: 
He said Samajwadi Party had promised to ensure the release of Muslim youths framed in terror cases but nothing had been done in this regard. 
On the issue of “triple talaq”, he said: “Why the Modi government keeps harping on it? Why do not they talk about Zakia Jafri and Akhlaq’s mother who was killed in Dadri… This government is being run on hollow promises.” Please Wait while comments are loading...
